Patchs sÃ£o lanÃ§ados e Ã© notÃ³rio como eles pedem sempre ao lado dos sobreviventes. 

- Mapas sÃ£o um ponto tÃ£o complicado pois para os sobreviventes muda pouca coisa porem para o killer, isso ja Ã© meio que definido se vc tem chance ou nÃ£o tem quase nem uma chance. Mapas grandes para killers com pouca mobilidade juntando isso com comunicaÃ§Ã£o e o matchmaking que pode por um killer Nivel 12 contra, 4 sobreviventes Nivel 3 suas chances sÃ£o quase 0, isso deixa o jogo frustrante para qualquer pessoa.

SIM PODE, para o killer contornar uma comunicaÃ§Ã£o, o jogador acaba tendo que escolher um estilo de jogo que as vezes nÃ£o Ã© oque ele queria.

 Isto faz com que a comunidade seja totalmente toxica, onde sobreviventes falam o que pode e nÃ£o pode, o que Ã© bom ou ruim, enquanto eles se comunicam, fazendo a tensÃ£o cair a 0 pois todos sabem oque esta acontecendo e onde o killer esta a todo momento, isso faz com que o killer jogue de outra forma, camperando e focando em apenas 1 jogador atÃ© ele morrer, para assim tentar deixar o jogo mais equilibrado.

-Desenvolvedores, varias lives que eles fazem dizendo sobre as mudanÃ§as que estÃ£o por vir demonstra que eles parecem nÃ£o conhecer o proprio game, isso virou atÃ© piada dentro da comunidade. 

- Um ponto menos relevante Ã© a preguiÃ§a em criar cosmeticos para o Pass de temporadas , que ficou CLARO no 3Âº Pass, Recolors de skins, um monte de pingente com apenas cores diferentes, isso desmotiva atÃ© a jogar o game pelos pass. Tried it out on a free weekend. I loved it and bought it. Is more fun with friends.

This game would be enjoyable if they fixed matchmaking. The way this game currently is, it's near unplayable for anybody trying out this game for the first time. You could be rank 20 (the lowest rank all new players start out on) and you'll still be able to face people with 500+ hours in the game at rank 1-4, no matter if you're survivor or killer (rare if you're a survivor, but still possible). Until the matchmaking gets fixed, this otherwise enjoyable game is just way too unbalanced, especially with SWF. There should be an option for killers ranks 9-20 to turn off playing against SWF (Survive with friends) so they can get used to the game or get good with killers before they uninstall the game because they played wraith against a SWF with 4 flashlights. I would rate this game 5/10, it really is a fun game on the incredibly rare occasion you play against and with people on a similar skill level as yourself, but it's just not enjoyable when playing against either new players if you're experienced, or incredibly skilled players if you're the one inexperienced. But what do I know, I don't review games for a living.
this game makes you wanna twist your balls in a knot and then suck them down a vacuum

Overall it is getting a better game. In earlier times the survivor were insanly stronger than the killers but the devs try to balance the game even though the community of Dead by Daylight is just extremly toxic and keeps telling they nerf the killers every time. Breakable walls and fixing of god loops seems more like a killer buff to me than a buff to the survivor for me. The game makes really much fun and it keeps getting better but I dont understand why things like the trapdoor, keys, and ebony mories are still in the game because they just ruin the fun everyone wants to have in this game. ItÂ´s just extremly boring to go agianst a good survive with friends and dominate them to see then that there are still 2 gens to do and only 2 survivors left but they escape threw the trapdoor. But the ebnoy mori is not better because if you get downed and hooked by a killer with an ebony mori he will just camp or tunnel you to win.

This game is pretty terrible. if you like endless frusteration and devs that litterally do not know what they are doing, this product may be right for you. It's a real shame because this game could have been a really interesting take on hide and seek.
It's fun and requires quite a lot of skill, there is a lot of bugs and rude people though, other then that I'd defiantly recommend this to different people
Fun, challenging in certain aspects but also laid back.

im still new to the game but being a killer or being a survivor is still fun and with friends its even better. i just with they would fix the ranked ques. im always getting paired with rank 5 and below when im rank 14 or so.
someone stop me from playing this game cause it's giving me heart attacks
